name: Namibia USSD
author: Oshimin Labs
readme:
This component registers an HTTP Route for USSD services and sends request data next. It stores `controller` instance in the `message.refs.controller` property. You must respond to the REST response component. < __IMPORTANT__:
The component works only with a defined Proxy endpoint in the Flow settings. < __URL__:
The URL must be relative to the defined Proxy endpoint. So if the endpoint is `/users/` and the desired address is `http://example.com/users/find` then the value must be `/find`
